description:
An unfortunate incident leaves Hakumei and Mikochi without a home. Later, Hakumei is hard at work when suddenly trouble arises.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Ciel étoilé et mandarines / Jour de travail
Hoshizora to Ponkan to Shigoto no Hi
Starlit Sky and Ponkan / Work Day
星空とポンカン と 仕事の日
